overview.short: Secondary level surge protection for IEEE Category B sub-panels.
overview.long: The SurgePure Mach 1 SPD System provides secondary level, multi-element surge protection for sub-distribution panels, isolating sensitive downstream equipment from switching motor loads and in-house surges when installed downstream from primary protection.

marketing_paragraphs: It isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads and in-house surges to compliment your upline grid of non-degrading SurgePures.
The Mach 1 SPD System is secondary level of multi-element surge protection to be located at your sub-distribution Panels.

key_features: Safe 240,000 amps of multi-element surge capacity for secondary level protection.
Unique fuse-links maintain safety of nearby equipment during catastrophic failure.
Designed for easy mounting and close-coupled surge protection.
Cost-effective component level isolation as part of a protection grid.
Non-degrading SPD technology for long-term 24/7 AC system integrity.
